name: Gravity Loop
description:
DESCRIPTION:

This is a 2D platofromer game developed as a project for the Pre-Made Jam 2, which is a 72 hour Game Jam and the first one in which I participate.

The game is made with the assets done by Rhaskia, the organizer of the Game Jam and involves "Islands" as the main theme.

You need to control you vertical gravity as you travel across floating islands in order to destroy 4 crystal balls and activate a portal.

CONTROLS:

If you press ENTER in the main menu, you will see all controls and some information

Hollow Neko (c) 2020
